extendedInfo.description: Search the catalog for books, CDs, DVDs, audiobooks, e-Books, and access your account. Place holds or renew items. See what's new. Check the calendar for events and classes or find out about the latest recommended books. Find the nearest library location and connect with library staff. Get the latest library news. Read the lastest postings on Facebook and our blogs.

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.comment: Continually improving.  Free magazine reading through Zinio is a nice addition.  Ability to scan bar codes is another nice added feature.  Whomever is in charge of the electronic side of the library is \'on the ball\'.  No need to buy books or magazines.  No need to pack books when traveling.
reviews.author: Tim Broussard

reviews.title: Dr. Digital
reviews.comment: Great app for finding books/ebooks and the scan a book feature is cool, find a book at a store scan it and see if your library has it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy app to use!!
reviews.comment: Love, love, love this app!! Must have for ALL books, CDs,  and DVDs! Simple to use & fun, too!!
reviews.author: Ashley Barnhill

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
reviews.comment: Love the fact that I can take the library with me everywhere!
reviews.author: A Google User
